Class WinCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class WinCanvas
extends com.erebos.engine.core.ECanvas
    Used for displaying and updating the screen when a Player wins the game.
